title: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage Tape 1 Review - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.18.25
description:
Go to http://joinbilt.com/kindafunny to start earning points on your rent payments today.

Go to http://factormeals.com/factorpodcast and use code FACTORPODCAST to get 50% off your first box plus free shipping.

Go to http://get.stash.com/KINDAFUNNY to see how you can receive $25 towards your
first stock purchase and to view important disclosures.

Our review of Lost Records: Bloom & Rage Tape 1, Shuhei was given an ultimatum at PlayStation, and GTA 6 might be going after Roblox and Fortnite.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
GAMESCAST - Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii Review
The STREAM is us playing 2 sponsored indie games back to back: Monoco 2 and Lost Skies
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Delaney Twining, Karl Jacobs, OmegaBuster, & Karin Lindner

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:05 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:05:06 - 'Lost Records: Bloom & Rage' (Tape 1) Review
00:28:55 - Ad  
00:32:30 - Shuhei Yoshida says he had to take PlayStation’s indie role or leave - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:39:10 - GTA 6: Rockstar is reportedly planning Roblox/Fortnite-style user-generated content - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:45:00 - Nintendo is discontinuing Gold Points on the Switch eShop, ahead of Switch 2 release - Ed Nightingale @ Eurogamer
00:47:16 - Skater Tyshawn Jones claims to be in upcoming Tony Hawk game remaster - Sal Romano @ Gematsu
00:51:50 - Wee News!
00:52:15 - SuperChats
00:53:40 - You‘re Wrong
00:54:15 - Breaking News tease: Netease laid off 'Marvel Rivals' Director and his team.
